name: Soul Mission
description:
This game is inspired by the Super Mario Odyssey main mechanic. In other words, you can possess your enemies and control them.

In the game you are a ghost, and you have to defeat a set number of oponents in a period of time using their attacks against themselves. If you run out of time, you will ascend to the other world not having finished your last quest.

*Pro-gamer tip: When there's only 1 enemy left, it may be the one you are possessing
